```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Asignation
```{r}
var1<-10
var2<-"Hello"
var3<-TRUE
```

Show
```{r}
print(var1);
print(var2);
print(var3);
print("Both way to show")
var1;var2;var3;
```
Arrays
```{r}
a1<- 1:8
a2<- 5:2
a3<- 1.5:9.8
a4<- c(1,2,3,4,76)

a1;a2;a3;a4;
```

Matrix
```{r}
c<-5.1:12.4;
M= matrix(c,nrow=2,ncol = 4,byrow = TRUE);
M;
print("---------------------")
print("M Transpose")
t(M)
```

Multiply Matrix
```{r}
Multiply<- M %*% t(M);
Multiply
```

Array Operators
```{r}
array1<- c(2.0,5.0,6.0)
array2<- c(8,2,3)
```
Add
```{r}
array1;array2
print(array1+array2)
```
Subtraction
```{r}
array1;array2
print(array1-array2)
print(array2-array1)
```
Multiplication
```{r}
array1;array2
print(array1*array2)
```

Division
```{r}
array1;array2
print(array1/array2)
print(array2/array1)
```

Get Residuo
```{r}
array1;array2;print(array1%%array2);print(array2%%array1)
```

Quotient

```{r}
array1;array2;print(array1%/%array2)
```

Exponential
```{r}
array1;array2;print(array1**array2); array1^array2
```
